parent_desc: Increased access for future entrepreneurs to digital infrastructure and green practice knowledge
label: [SDG 4.4.1]Number of youth and adults with ICT skills in project targeted locations, by type of skill
means_of_verification: Data collected through monthly monitoring reports, attendance sheet, quiz and assignment results of training programs
source_of_data: Teachers and trainers at DigiGreen centres, BW and FJN monitoring reports
frequency_of_data_collection: Monthly progress updates on training programs

parent_desc: Digi Green centers infrastructure established and operational
label: Number of confirmed sites for digital infrastructure implementation
means_of_verification: On-site technical inspection report on the sites for digital infrastructure
source_of_data: On-site technical inspection report by technical service provider
frequency_of_data_collection: Once, after the on-site technical inspection conducted

parent_desc: Digi Green centers infrastructure established and operational
label: Completion of detailed design plans for DigiGreen Centers including equipment and technology specifications
means_of_verification: Review and approval of design plans for DigiGreen Centers
source_of_data: Design plans for DigiGreen Centers by technical service provider
frequency_of_data_collection: Once, after design plans developed

parent_desc: Digi Green centers infrastructure established and operational
label: Completion of formalized governance agreements with Schools, Universities, and Mairies
means_of_verification: Signed governance agreements with educational institutions and local government offices
source_of_data: Governance agreements with Schools, Universities, and Mairies formalizing governance structures, roles, and responsibilities
frequency_of_data_collection: Once, after governance agreements signed

parent_desc: Digi Green centers infrastructure established and operational
label: Number of DigiGreen Centers fully operational in the 35 selected locations
means_of_verification: Inspection reports confirming operational status
source_of_data: DigiGreen Center Records, Technical service provider reports
frequency_of_data_collection: Monthly status reports on DigiGreen Center implementation

parent_desc: Digi Green centers infrastructure established and operational
label: Completion of the DigiGreen Centers long-term strategy
means_of_verification: Finalized document of the DigiGreen Centers long-term strategy including resource mobilization strategy
source_of_data: The official document outlining the DigiGreen Centers long-term strategy
frequency_of_data_collection: Once, after the strategy document developed

parent_desc: Enhanced access for practicing entrepreneurs to green jobs and market through a Greenpreneurs Program

parent_desc: Enhanced access for practicing entrepreneurs to green jobs and market through a Greenpreneurs Program

parent_desc: Greenpreneurs incubation program developed

parent_desc: Greenpreneurs incubation program implemented

frequency_of_data_collection: Once, after the promotional activities finished

parent_desc: Greenpreneurs incubation program implemented
label: Number of greenpreneurs who participated in the Greenpreneurs incubation program
means_of_verification: Attendance records from the incubation program sessions
source_of_data: Registration databases or platforms
frequency_of_data_collection: Regularly updated participant records after each program session

parent_desc: Greenpreneurs incubation program implemented

parent_desc: Greenpreneurs incubation program implemented
label: Number of mentorship program held
means_of_verification: Reports on the design and implementation of mentorship session

parent_desc: Greenpreneurs incubation program implemented
label: Number of networking events held
means_of_verification: Documentation of each networking event, including planning and logistics
source_of_data: Reports summarizing the planning and execution of each networking event
frequency_of_data_collection: Once, each time after the events closed

parent_desc: Greenpreneurs incubation program implemented
label: Number of pitch competition held
means_of_verification: Reports summarizing the planning and execution of each pitch competition
source_of_data: Business model applications, bank transfer confirmations
frequency_of_data_collection: Once, each time after the competitions closed

parent_desc: Strengthened digital green ecosystem through enablers of entrepreneurship

source_of_data: LOI with early funders including venture capital, incubators and accelerators
frequency_of_data_collection: Once, after the LOIs signed

parent_desc: Strengthened digital green ecosystem through enablers of entrepreneurship

means_of_verification: Green growth publications and/or knowledge product
source_of_data: Green growth publications and/or knowledge product

parent_desc: A conducive environment for Greenpreneur program sustainability created

parent_desc: A conducive environment for Greenpreneur program sustainability created

parent_desc: A conducive environment for Greenpreneur program sustainability created

parent_desc: Capacities of Ivorian government and institutions enhanced in digital green market and industry

means_of_verification: Documentation of the policy review process, including the number of policies and frameworks examined
source_of_data: Policy review reports documenting findings and recommendations

parent_desc: Capacities of Ivorian government and institutions enhanced in digital green market and industry

means_of_verification: Enrollment and attendance records and databases for each course session

parent_desc: Capacities of Ivorian government and institutions enhanced in digital green market and industry

means_of_verification: Documentation of study tour planning, logistics, and execution
source_of_data: Study tour participant lists and attendance records, reports detailing the planning and execution of the study tour

parent_desc: Capacities of Ivorian government and institutions enhanced in digital green market and industry
label: Number of targeted stakeholders reached through the dissemination of publications and/or knowledge products
means_of_verification: Reports summarizing the reach and impact of the publications

frequency_of_data_collection: Regular feedback collection from stakeholders who received the publications
